text: MicroWiki is a free online encyclopedia website. It was started on 27 May 2005 to make micronational pages with more information than Wikipedia can with its current rules. MicroWiki calls itself the "largest encyclopaedia on micronations". As of December 2020, MicroWiki had about 115,000 pages. ==References== ==Other websites== *MicroWiki Category:Websites established in 2005 Category:Wikis Category:Encyclopedia websites Category:MediaWiki websites
title: MicroWiki
